# About the Project

Comprehensive documentation and templates for implementing Digital Product Passports aligned with CIRPASS-2 standards. These guides translate complex EU regulation into actionable implementation steps.

# Contents

- Technical architecture templates
- Data model examples
- Stakeholder journey maps
- Compliance checklists
- Integration patterns

# Impact

Public resource helping manufacturers understand and implement DPP requirements ahead of 2027 deadline.

title: 3D Viewer for DPP Platform
description: Interactive 3D product visualization for Digital Product Passports
longDescription:
# About the Project

An interactive 3D viewer component that integrates with the HumanMachine Platform, allowing consumers and stakeholders to explore products visually while accessing passport data.

# Features

- WebGL-based 3D rendering
- Touch and mouse interaction
- Hotspot annotations
- Integration with DPP data
